title: Home Internet Troubleshooting - Slow Speed
description: A customer reports their home internet service is very slow. The agent must diagnose the cause.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and the speed tier of their internet plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer is on a '100 Mbps' plan.

tasks.description: Run a remote line test and a speed test to the customer's modem.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent's remote test shows the modem is receiving the full 100 Mbps speed.

tasks.description: Since the issue is likely with the customer's Wi-Fi, guide them to run a speed test on a device connected via Ethernet.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear instructions for the customer to perform a local speed test.

tasks.description: Based on the local test results, recommend Wi-Fi optimization steps like changing the channel or moving the router.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the problem as local Wi-Fi and provides relevant troubleshooting advice.
